instructions: First, long press on the Dark theme icon when you bring down the Quick Settings selections on top of the display. You should see the three scheduling options show up: None , Turns on from sunset to sunrise , and Turns on at custom time . The first two options are self-explanatory, but if you tap on Turns on at custom time selection you will then be given the option to select when you want the Android 11 dark theme to be turned on.
